summary.span: 包含有关在呈现时如何操作位图和图元文件颜色的信息。

span.span: Contains information about how bitmap and metafile colors are manipulated during rendering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象维护多个颜色调整设置，包括颜色调整矩阵、 灰度调整矩阵、 灰度校正值、 颜色映射表和颜色阈值的值。An object maintains several color-adjustment settings, including color-adjustment matrices, grayscale-adjustment matrices, gamma-correction values, color-map tables, and color-threshold values. 呈现过程中，颜色可以更正、 变暗，变亮，并且删除。During rendering, colors can be corrected, darkened, lightened, and removed. 若要应用这些操作，初始化对象并将该路径传递对象 (的路径以及) 到方法。To apply such manipulations, initialize an object and pass the path of that object (along with the path of an ) to the method. ## Examples 下面的示例将所有的一种颜色 （0.2，0.0，0.4，1.0） 的映像和双精度型值红色组件将 0.2 添加到红色、 绿色和蓝色组件The following example takes an image that is all one color (0.2, 0.0, 0.4, 1.0) and doubles the red component adds 0.2 to the red, green, and blue components 下图右侧显示在左侧的原始映像和变换后的图像。The following illustration shows the original image on the left and the transformed image on the right. ![颜色](~/add/media/colortrans1.png "颜色")![Colors](~/add/media/colortrans1.png "Colors") 下面的示例中的代码使用以下步骤进行重新着色：The code in the following example uses the following steps to perform the recoloring: 1. 初始化对象。Initialize a object. 2. 创建对象并将传递对象传递给方法对象。Create an object and pass the object to the method of the object. 3. 传递对象传递给方法对象。Pass the object to the method of a object. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.RecoloringImages#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.RecoloringImages/CS/Class1.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.RecoloringImages#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.RecoloringImages/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

span.span: Clears the brush color-remap table of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，你可以指定为默认类别的一个颜色重新映射表、 位图类别中，不同的颜色重新映射表和仍为画笔类别的不同的颜色重新映射表。For example, you can specify one color-remap table for the default category, a different color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the brush category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定为画笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于画笔类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the brush category, the default settings apply to the brush category. 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假设你指定默认重新映射表将红色转换为绿色，并指定 1.8 默认伽玛值。For example, suppose you specify a default remap table that converts red to green, and you specify a default gamma value of 1.8. 如果调用方法，默认重新映射表 （红色为绿色） 和默认伽玛值 (1.8) 将不会应用于画笔。If you call the method, the default remap table (red to green) and the default gamma value (1.8) will not apply to brushes. 如果稍后调用方法，画笔类别不会还原为默认重新映射表; 相反，画笔类别就可以不重新映射表。If you later call the method, the brush category will not revert to the default remap table; rather, the brush category will have no remap table. 同样，画笔类别将恢复为默认伽玛值。相反，画笔类别都包含没有伽玛值。Similarly, the brush category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the brush category will have no gamma value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，可以指定为默认类别的一个颜色键、 位图类别中，不同的颜色键和仍为钢笔类别不同的颜色键。For example, you can specify one color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假设你指定使任何颜色与 200 到 255 之间的红色组件透明，默认颜色键并指定 1.8 默认伽玛值。For example, suppose you specify a default color key that makes any color with a red component from 200 through 255 transparent, and you specify a default gamma value of 1.8. 如果你通过调用设置钢笔类别的颜色键方法、 默认颜色键和默认伽玛值将不会应用于钢笔。If you set the color key of the pen category by calling the method, the default color key and the default gamma value will not apply to pens. 如果稍后要清除的钢笔颜色键通过调用方法，钢笔类别不会还原为默认颜色键; 相反，钢笔类别将具有任何颜色键。If you later clear the pen color key by calling the method, the pen category will not revert to the default color key; rather, the pen category will have no color key. 同样，钢笔类别将恢复为默认伽玛值。相反，钢笔类别都包含没有伽玛值。Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，你可以指定为默认类别输出通道和位图类别的不同的输出通道。For example, you can specify an output channel for the default category and a different output channel for the bitmap category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定位图类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于位图类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category. 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假设你指定输出通道和为默认类别调整矩阵。For example, suppose you specify an output channel and an adjustment matrix for the default category. 如果你通过调用上设置了位图类别输出通道方法，则默认输出通道不会应用于位图。If you set the output channel for the bitmap category by calling the method, the default output channel will not apply to bitmaps. 如果你更高版本清除位图通过调用的输出通道方法，位图类别不会还原为默认输出通道; 相反，位图类别将具有任何输出通道设置。If you later clear the bitmap output channel by calling the method, the bitmap category will not revert to the default output channel; rather, the bitmap category will have no output channel setting. 同样，位图类别不会还原到默认颜色调整矩阵;相反，位图类别都包含没有颜色调整矩阵。Similarly, the bitmap category will not revert to the default color-adjustment matrix; rather, the bitmap category will have no color-adjustment matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，你可以指定为默认类别的输出通道配置文件和位图类别的不同的输出通道配置文件。For example, you can specify an output channel profile for the default category and a different output channel profile for the bitmap category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定位图类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于位图类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，你可以指定为默认类别的输出通道配置文件和位图类别的不同的输出通道配置文件。For example, you can specify an output channel profile for the default category and a different output channel profile for the bitmap category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定位图类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于位图类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category. 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假设你指定的输出通道配置文件和默认类别调整矩阵。For example, suppose you specify an output channel profile and an adjustment matrix for the default category. 如果你通过调用上设置了位图类别的输出通道配置文件方法，则默认输出通道配置文件将不应用于位图。If you set the output channel profile for the bitmap category by calling the method, the default output channel profile will not apply to bitmaps. 如果你更高版本清除位图输出通道配置文件，通过调用方法，位图类别不会还原为默认输出通道配置文件; 相反，位图类别将具有任何输出通道配置文件设置。If you later clear the bitmap output channel profile by calling the method, the bitmap category will not revert to the default output channel profile; rather, the bitmap category will have no output channel profile setting. 同样，位图类别不会还原到默认颜色调整矩阵;相反，位图类别都包含没有颜色调整矩阵。Similarly, the bitmap category will not revert to the default color-adjustment matrix; rather, the bitmap category will have no color-adjustment matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，可以指定为默认类别重新映射表、 位图类别中，另一个重新映射表和仍为钢笔类别不同重新映射表。For example, you can specify a remap table for the default category, a different remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different remap table for the pen category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，则默认设置应用于钢笔类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, then the default settings apply to the pen category. 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假设你指定重新映射表和为默认类别伽玛值。For example, suppose you specify a remap table and a gamma value for the default category. 如果你通过调用设置钢笔类别重新映射表方法，默认重新映射表将不应用于钢笔。If you set the remap table for the pen category by calling the method, the default remap table will not apply to pens. 如果稍后通过调用清除钢笔重新映射表方法，钢笔类别不会还原为默认重新映射表; 相反，钢笔类别就可以不重新映射表。If you later clear the pen remap table by calling the method, the pen category will not revert to the default remap table; rather, the pen category will have no remap table. 同样，钢笔类别将恢复为默认伽玛值。相反，钢笔类别都包含没有伽玛值。Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.

summary.span: 为默认类别清除阈值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 阈值是一个介于 0 到 1，指定每个颜色组件的分界点。The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component. 例如，假设的阈值设置为 0.7，并且假设呈现一种颜色的红色、 绿色和蓝色分量 230、 50，分别为和 220。For example, suppose the threshold is set to 0.7, and suppose you are rendering a color whose red, green, and blue components are 230, 50, and 220, respectively. 红色的组件 (230) 大于 0.7 x 255, 因此红色组件将更改为 255 （最大亮度）。The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x255, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity). 绿色的组件 (50) 小于 0.7 x 255,，因此绿色组件将更改为 0。The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0. 蓝色分量 (220) 大于 0.7 x 255, 因此蓝色组件将更改为 255。The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255. 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，你可以指定为默认类别阈值、 针对位图类别中，一个不同的阈值和仍为钢笔类别一个不同的阈值。For example, you can specify a threshold for the default category, a different threshold for the bitmap category, and still a different threshold for the pen category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 阈值是一个介于 0 到 1，指定每个颜色组件的分界点。The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component. 例如，假设的阈值设置为 0.7，并且假设呈现一种颜色的红色、 绿色和蓝色分量 230、 50，分别为和 220。For example, suppose the threshold is set to 0.7, and suppose you are rendering a color whose red, green, and blue components are 230, 50, and 220, respectively. 红色的组件 (230) 大于 0.7x55，因此红色组件将更改为 255 （最大亮度）。The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x55, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity). 绿色的组件 (50) 小于 0.7 x 255,，因此绿色组件将更改为 0。The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0. 蓝色分量 (220) 大于 0.7 x 255, 因此蓝色组件将更改为 255。The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255. 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，你可以指定为默认类别阈值、 针对位图类别中，一个不同的阈值和仍为钢笔类别一个不同的阈值。For example, you can specify a threshold for the default category, a different threshold for the bitmap category, and still a different threshold for the pen category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假设你指定的阈值和默认类别的伽玛值。For example, suppose you specify a threshold and a gamma value for the default category. 如果你通过调用设置为钢笔类别阈值方法，默认阈值将不应用于钢笔。If you set the threshold for the pen category by calling the method, the default threshold will not apply to pens. 如果稍后通过调用清除钢笔阈值方法，钢笔类别不会还原为默认阈值; 相反，钢笔类别将具有无阈值。If you later clear the pen threshold by calling the method, the pen category will not revert to the default threshold; rather, the pen category will have no threshold. 同样，钢笔类别将恢复为默认伽玛值。相反，钢笔类别都包含没有伽玛值。Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，可以指定为默认类别的颜色重新映射表、 位图类别中，不同的颜色重新映射表和仍为钢笔类别的不同的颜色重新映射表。For example, you can specify a color-remap table for the default category, a different color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the pen category. 当调用方法，你可以指定用于调整的调色板颜色调整类别。When you call the method, you can specify the adjustment category that is used to adjust the palette colors. 例如，如果你通过到方法时，位图类别的设置用于调整的调色板颜色调整。For example, if you pass to the method, the adjustment settings of the bitmap category are used to adjust the palette colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 颜色重新映射表是一个数组结构。A color-remap table is an array of structures. 每个结构具有两个对象： 一个指定旧的颜色，另一个指定相应的新颜色。Each structure has two objects: one that specifies an old color and one that specifies a corresponding new color. 呈现过程中，重新映射表中的旧颜色之一匹配的任何颜色将变为对应的新颜色。During rendering, any color that matches one of the old colors in the remap table is changed to the corresponding new color. 调用方法具有相同的效果与传入到方法。Calling the method has the same effect as passing to the method. 指定重新映射表适用于使用画笔填充的图元文件中的项。The specified remap table applies to items in metafiles that are filled with a brush. 此方法旨在仅用于图元文件。This method is intended to be used only with metafiles. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: 1. 创建一个单元素包含为旧的颜色的红色和绿色作为新的颜色数组。Creates a single-element array that holds red as the old color and green as the new color. 2. 将此数组传递给新创建对象。Passes this array to a newly created object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法设置的上限和下限的颜色键的值，以便可以透明进行的颜色范围。This method sets the high and low color-key values so that a range of colors can be made transparent. 任何具有每个相应的各个组件之间的高和较低的颜色键其三个组件 （红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 的颜色由透明。Any color that has each of its three components (red, green, blue) between the corresponding components of the high and low color keys is made transparent. 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，可以指定为默认类别的颜色键、 位图类别中，不同的颜色键和仍为钢笔类别不同的颜色键。For example, you can specify a color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅方法。For a code example, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法设置的上限和下限的颜色键的值，以便可以透明进行的颜色范围。This method sets the high and low color-key values so that a range of colors can be made transparent. 任何具有每个相应的各个组件之间的高和较低的颜色键其三个组件 （红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 的颜色由透明。Any color that has each of its three components (red, green, blue) between the corresponding components of the high and low color keys is made transparent. 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，可以指定为默认类别的颜色键、 位图类别中，不同的颜色键和仍为钢笔类别不同的颜色键。For example, you can specify a color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假设你指定为默认类别的调整设置的集合。For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category. 如果你通过将传递设置钢笔类别的颜色键到方法，无默认调整设置将应用于钢笔。If you set the color key for the pen category by passing to the method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to pens. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: 1. 打开使用 Circle.bmp 的文件并将其绘制到屏幕。Opens an that uses the file Circle.bmp and draws it to the screen. 2. 创建对象，并通过调用设置其颜色键方法。Creates an object and sets its color key by calling the method. 3. 将图像绘制到使用的颜色键屏幕对象。Draws the image to the screen using the color key of the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型值为`gamma`参数都是从 1.0 到 2.2; 但是，从 0.1 到 5.0 的值无法证明在某些情况下有用。Typical values for the `gamma` parameter are from 1.0 to 2.2; however, values from 0.1 to 5.0 could prove useful in some circumstances. 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，可以指定为默认类别伽玛值、 位图类别中，另一个伽玛值和仍为钢笔类别另一个伽玛值。For example, you can specify a gamma value for the default category, a different gamma value for the bitmap category, and still a different gamma value for the pen category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. 常用的范围之外的伽玛值可能对于旧 CRT 监视器，或者异常的照明条件，如工业环境或窗口会显示中的监视器。Gamma values outside the usual range may be useful for old CRT monitors or for monitors that are in unusual lighting conditions, such as industrial environments or window displays. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此外，你需要将图像文件路径更改为你系统上有效的路径和映像名称。In addition, you need to change the image file path to a path and image name valid on your system. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: 1. 打开使用 Camera.jpg 的文件并将其绘制到屏幕的伽玛使用默认值。Opens an that uses the file Camera.jpg and draws it to the screen using the default value for gamma. 2. 创建对象并将其伽玛值设置为 2.2，通过调用方法。Creates an object and sets its gamma to 2.2 by calling the method. 3. 使用仅将设置伽玛值向屏幕绘制图像 （第二个照相机）对象。Draws the image (a second camera) to the screen using the gamma value just set in the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型值为`gamma`参数都是从 1.0 到 2.2; 但是，从 0.1 到 5.0 的值无法证明在某些情况下有用。Typical values for the `gamma` parameter are from 1.0 to 2.2; however, values from 0.1 to 5.0 could prove useful in some circumstances. 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，可以指定为默认类别伽玛值、 位图类别中，另一个伽玛值和仍为钢笔类别另一个伽玛值。For example, you can specify a gamma value for the default category, a different gamma value for the bitmap category, and still a different gamma value for the pen category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假设你指定为默认类别的调整设置的集合。For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category. 如果你通过将传递设置钢笔类别的伽玛值到方法，无默认调整设置将应用于钢笔。If you set the gamma value for the pen category by passing to the method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to pens. 常用的范围之外的伽玛值可能对于旧 CRT 监视器，或者异常的照明条件，如工业环境或窗口会显示中的监视器。Gamma values outside the usual range may be useful for old CRT monitors or for monitors that are in unusual lighting conditions, such as industrial environments or window displays. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅方法。For a code example, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，可以指定为默认类别伽玛值、 位图类别中，另一个伽玛值和仍为钢笔类别另一个伽玛值。For example, you can specify a gamma value for the default category, a different gamma value for the bitmap category, and still a different gamma value for the pen category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: 1. 打开使用 Camera.jpg 的文件。Opens an that uses the file Camera.jpg. 2. 设置伽玛值的为 0.25 的对象。Sets the gamma value of the object to 0.25. 3. 将图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the image to the screen. 4. 调用 方法。Calls the method. 5. 将图像 （第二个照相机） 绘制到屏幕上。但是，因为调用方法、 设置默认值为 1.0 和图像的值的伽玛绘制到用默认伽玛设置将整个屏幕。Draws the image (a second camera) to the screen; however, because the method was called, the gamma setting defaults to a value of 1.0 and the image is drawn to the screen with the default gamma setting. 请注意，在左侧的映像是非常色调 （0.25 伽玛） 右侧映像有多个对比度 （伽玛值为 1.0）。Note that the image on the left is very washed out (gamma of 0.25) and the image on the right has more contrast (gamma of 1.0). remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用方法将图像转换为 CMYK 色彩空间并检查之一 CMYK 颜色通道的强度。You can use the method to convert an image to a CMYK color space and examine the intensities of one of the CMYK color channels. 例如，假设你创建对象并将其位图输出通道设置为。For example, suppose you create an object and set its bitmap output channel to . 如果传递的路径对象传递给方法，计算每个像素的蓝绿色部分，并且在呈现的图像中的每个像素的阴影属于灰色指示其青色通道的强度。If you pass the path of that object to the method, the cyan component of each pixel is calculated, and each pixel in the rendered image is a shade of gray that indicates the intensity of its cyan channel. 同样，你可以呈现指示洋红色，黄色，和黑色通道强度的图像。Similarly, you can render images that indicate the intensities of the magenta, yellow, and black channels. 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，你可以指定为默认类别输出通道和位图类别的不同的输出通道。For example, you can specify an output channel for the default category and a different output channel for the bitmap category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定位图类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于位图类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form. 处理窗体的事件并调用`ShowOutputChannels`，并传递`e`作为。Handle the form's event and call `ShowOutputChannels`, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 颜色重新映射表是一个数组结构。A color-remap table is an array of structures. 每个结构具有两个对象： 一个指定旧的颜色，另一个指定相应的新颜色。Each structure has two objects: one that specifies an old color and one that specifies a corresponding new color. 呈现过程中，重新映射表中的旧颜色之一匹配的任何颜色将变为对应的新颜色。During rendering, any color that matches one of the old colors in the remap table is changed to the corresponding new color. 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，你可以指定默认类别、 位图类别的颜色重新映射表和仍为钢笔类别的不同的颜色重新映射表颜色重新映射。For example, you can specify a color remap for the default category, a color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the pen category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: 1. 创建映像 （一个红圈）、 将其保存为 Circle2.jpg、 打开该映像，并将其绘制到屏幕。Creates an image (a red circle), saves it as Circle2.jpg, opens that image, and draws it to the screen. 2. 创建映射的颜色为红色，绿色到一个颜色图。Creates a color map that maps the color red to the color green. 3. 绘制早先创建的图像到屏幕再次，但这次使用颜色地图。Draws the image created earlier to the screen again, but this time using the color map. remarks.format: ## Remarks 颜色重新映射表是一个数组结构。A color-remap table is an array of structures. 每个结构具有两个对象： 一个指定旧的颜色，另一个指定相应的新颜色。Each structure has two objects: one that specifies an old color and one that specifies a corresponding new color. 呈现过程中，重新映射表中的旧颜色之一匹配的任何颜色将变为对应的新颜色。During rendering, any color that matches one of the old colors in the remap table is changed to the corresponding new color. 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，你可以指定默认类别、 位图类别的颜色重新映射表和仍为钢笔类别的不同的颜色重新映射表颜色重新映射。For example, you can specify a color remap for the default category, a color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the pen category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假设你指定为默认类别的调整设置的集合。For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category. 如果你通过将传递设置钢笔类别的颜色重新映射表到方法，无默认调整设置将应用于钢笔。If you set the color-remap table for the pen category by passing to the method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to pens. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅方法。For a code example, see the method.

span.span: Sets the threshold (transparency range).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetThreshold(float32 threshold) cil managed

param.name: threshold
param.span: 指定阈值的实数。

span.span: A real number that specifies the threshold value.

summary.span: 为默认类别设置阈值（透明范围）。

span.span: Sets the threshold (transparency range) for the default category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 阈值是一个介于 0 到 1，指定每个颜色组件的分界点。The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component. 例如，假设的阈值设置为 0.7，并且假设呈现一种颜色的红色、 绿色和蓝色分量 230、 50，分别为和 220。For example, suppose the threshold is set to 0.7, and suppose you are rendering a color whose red, green, and blue components are 230, 50, and 220, respectively. 红色的组件 (230) 大于 0.7 x 255, 因此红色组件将更改为 255 （最大亮度）。The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x255, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity). 绿色的组件 (50) 小于 0.7 x 255,，因此绿色组件将更改为 0。The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0. 蓝色分量 (220) 大于 0.7 x 255, 因此蓝色组件将更改为 255。The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255. 对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置： 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，你可以指定为默认类别阈值、 针对位图类别中，阈值和仍为钢笔类别一个不同的阈值。For example, you can specify a threshold for the default category, a threshold for the bitmap category, and still a different threshold for the pen category. 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: 1. 打开并将其绘制到屏幕。Opens an and draws it to the screen. 2. 创建对象，并通过设置其阈值方法。Creates an object and sets its threshold by using the method. 3. 将图像绘制到屏幕，使用的阈值对象。Draws the image to the screen by using the threshold of the object.
